org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi
Class RandomAccessFileCpi

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.gridlab.gat.io.cpi.RandomAccessFileCpi
All Implemented Interfaces:
Monitorable, RandomAccessFile, java.io.Serializable
public abstract class RandomAccessFileCpi
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomAccessFile

Capability provider interface to the File class.

Capability provider wishing to provide the functionality of the File class must extend this class and implement all of the abstract methods in this class. Each abstract method in this class mirrors the corresponding method in this File class and will be used to implement the corresponding method in the File class at runtime.

See Also:

Constructor Detail

RandomAccessFileCpi

public RandomAccessFileCpi(GATContext gatContext,
                           Preferences preferences,
                           File file,
                           java.lang.String mode)
Constructs a FileCpi instance which corresponds to the physical file identified by the passed Location and whose access rights are determined by the passed GATContext.

Parameters:
gatContext - A GATContext which is used to determine the access rights for this FileCpi.
preferences - preferences to be associated with this file
file - the file to create this random access file on
mode - see RandomAccessFile
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown upon creation problems
Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
Description copied from interface: RandomAccessFile
Tests this RandomAccessFile for equality with the passed Object.

If the given object is not a RandomAccessFile, then this method immediately returns false.

If the given object is a RandomAccessFile, then it is deemed equal to this instance if a URI object constructed from this RandomAccessFile's location and a URI object constructed from the passed RandomAccessFile's URI are equal as determined by the Equals method of URI.

Specified by:
equals in interface RandomAccessFile
Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
object - The Object to test for equality
Returns:
A boolean indicating equality

addMetricListener

public void addMetricListener(MetricListener metricListener,
                              Metric metric)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method adds the passed instance of a MetricListener to the list of MetricListeners which are notified of MetricEvents by an instance of this class. The passed MetricListener is only notified of MetricEvents which correspond to Metric instance passed to this method.

Specified by:
addMetricListener in interface Monitorable
Parameters:
metricListener - The MetricListener to notify of MetricEvents
metric - The Metric corresponding to the MetricEvents for which the passed MetricListener will be notified
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance

getMetrics

public java.util.List getMetrics()
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
This method returns a java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance.

Specified by:
getMetrics in interface Monitorable
Returns:
An java.util.List of Metric instances. Each Metric instance in this java.util.List is a Metric which can be monitored on this instance
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance

removeMetricListener

public void removeMetricListener(MetricListener metricListener,
                                 Metric metric)
                          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: Monitorable
Removes the passed MetricListener from the java.util.List of MetricListeners which are notified of MetricEvents corresponding to the passed Metric instance.

Specified by:
removeMetricListener in interface Monitorable
Parameters:
metricListener - The MetricListener to notify of MetricEvents
metric - The Metric corresponding to the MetricEvents for which the passed MetricListener has been notified
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown upon problems accessing the remote instance
